example.text: Commemorating Israel's 75th anniversary, we must acknowledge there are still individuals, both within the US and globally, intent on its destruction. I stand firm in supporting Israel's right to defend itself and its citizens. [[url]]

Well thanks to the brilliant work of Sophie in my office, we found a much bigger and better space that helps support our work for Utahns in DC The second high I have is on the passage of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA). It's a big deal and it passed with good bipartisan support.
